commandDescription: Interactive tool for keeping track of the manual steps performed during a release. The command can execute a checklist of tasks or resume execution of an execution log.
checklistFilePathFlagDescription: The path to the checklist, containing tasks to be run. Visit [link] for the checklist schema
outputDirFlagDescription: The directory to output execution logs. Sub-directories for the alias & date are automatically created
aliasFlagDescription: Execute tasks with the alias or username e.g. SIT
executionLogFlagDescription: File path of the execution log from which to resume execution
